SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS03
UPPER(COLUMNNAME) LIKE UPPER( CONCAT('%' , #searchColumnName# , '%') )
UPPER(COLUMNDESC) LIKE UPPER( CONCAT('%' , #searchColumnDesc# , '%') )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO , COLUMNNAME , COLUMNDESC , COLUMNLENGTH , ISKEY , KEYSEQ , ISINTERFACE , COMBONAME , COMBODEPTH , COLUMNDEFAULT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS03 , (SELECT @NO := 0) R
UPPER(COLUMNNAME) LIKE UPPER( CONCAT('%' , #searchColumnName# , '%') )
UPPER(COLUMNDESC) LIKE UPPER( CONCAT('%' , #searchColumnDesc# , '%') )
ORDER BY COLUMNNAME ) T WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
